title: Identify incidence of excise tax from graph

content.question: Which of the following bears the total tax burden?

choices.label: The consumers and the producers each bear a part of it.
The group that legally pays the tax bears it.

content.answer: The consumers and the producers each bear a part of it.

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
